casebody.data:
MOUNTAIN VILLAGES, LLC. et al.
v.
SADLER. No. 204P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 24, 2015. Zara Ellis Sadler, Sylva, for Sadler, Zara Ellis. Mountain Villages, Lori Richards, for Mountain Villages, LLC.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of June 2015 by Defendant-Appellant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of June 2015."
